Quil Lemons (amụrụ n'afọ 1997) bụ onye Amerịka na-ese foto
E gosipụtara ọrụ ya na Philadelphia Museum of Art na International Center of Photography. N'afọ 2021, ọ ghọrọ onye kachasị nta na-ese foto nke e ji mee ihe n'ihu Vanity Fair.
Ọ gara Charter High School for Architecture and Design na Philadelphia na The New School na New York.

N'afọ 2017, Lemons wepụtara usoro foto a na-akpọ GlitterBoy E gosipụtara foto ya na akwụkwọ gụnyere The New York Times, Variety, na Vogue. E ji foto Lemons nke Billie Eilish mee ihe na mkpuchi ọnwa Maachị afọ  2021 nke Vanity Fair, na-eme ka ọ bụrụ onye kachasị nta na-ese foto mkpuchi magazin ahụ.  Ọ bụ onye na-ese foto maka mkpọsa mgbasa ozi nke Savage X Pride Collection na-eme emume LGBT Pride site na Rihanna's Savage X Fenty fashion label.
A gụnyere Lemons n'akwụkwọ The New Black Vanguard: Photography Between Art and Fashion nke Antwaun Sargent.
Lemons bi na Brooklyn, New York.
